Articles.Content: I thought that the decals updated in version 1.10 would be a part with a very high degree of freedom. But it made me a little disappointed. The fixation of the decal radian arc makes it very headache when it is displayed on the fairing of different radii.I hope the official can use projection decals.just like@cineboxandrew  ，His work Conformal Decals has a very high degree of freedom, you can create whatever you want
Use that mod then, or build your fairings to the size of the flags. I find the new flags/decals to be absolutely fine.

Yeah, they're fine. You can finally paint your rockets in stock by covering them in flags (and using the 4x (landscape) or 6x (portrait) symetry). The part count will be high though, but looks over efficiency I suppose ( I need to do a set of flags / decals, including a full alphabet and numbers)(surely someone can probably also export a full set of emoji as png too).
